page.title: 10Celebrities
page.content: {George Eliot Nuneaton boasts one famous author, George Eliot who lived many years ago. She was a woman who took a man's name as it was hard to be accepted as a female author. {Geof White Geof White is a modern author. He worked backstage in a theatre in 1968. For 4 years he studied at collge then applied for a job as a theatre critic which he has been doing for 10 years. He writes mostly about local history. {Catherine Fear She is a folk singer who has been playing the guitar since the age of 12. She prefers protest songs such as 'Mr.Atom'-her favorite. Recently she has been writing songs about Nuneaton and the people who live here. She hopes folk music will become more popular in the future.
